Item ID12603

The tyrannical ring is a ring dropped by Callisto south of the Demonic Ruins.

It is very useful when using crush weapons as the tyrannical ring is one of only two rings that provide a crush attack bonus, the other being the Brimstone ring. However, unlike the Brimstone ring and Berserker ring, the tyrannical ring does not provide any strength bonus.

It is often used with Dragon warhammer for its special attack, as it only reduces the enemy's defence if the player hits, which is where the tyrannical ring's accuracy bonus helps.

It can be imbued using 650,000 Nightmare Zone reward points or 260 Soul Wars Zeal Tokens, giving it a +8 crush attack and defence bonus, instead of the usual +4.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 July 2014
(update | poll)

The Tyrannical ring can now be imbued at Nightmare Zone for 650,000 points, doubling its crush bonus.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Early models for the Wilderness rings by Mod Alfred.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • On release, the ring was weightless. This was changed in an update.
  • The tyrannical ring is one of four rings that weighs at least 1 kg, the others being the tyrannical ring (i), the granite ring and the granite ring (i).

[[File:Tyrannical ring detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''tyrannical ring''' is a ring dropped by [[Callisto]] south of the [[Demonic Ruins]].

It is very useful when using [[crush weapons]] as the tyrannical ring is one of only two rings that provide a crush attack bonus, the other being the [[Brimstone ring]]. However, unlike the Brimstone ring and [[Berserker ring]], the tyrannical ring does not provide any strength bonus.

It is often used with [[Dragon warhammer]] for its [[special attack]], as it only reduces the enemy's defence if the player hits, which is where the tyrannical ring's accuracy bonus helps.

It can be [[Tyrannical ring (i)|imbued]] using 650,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] reward points or 260 [[Soul Wars]] [[Zeal Tokens]], giving it a +8 crush attack and defence bonus, instead of the usual +4.
